organization.name: Global Genex Inc.
organization.alternateName: 株式会社グローバルジェネックス
organization.description: A professional consulting company based in Fukuoka, Japan. We help retail and manufacturing companies improve operations, leverage data, and expand internationally. Providing practical solutions to drive business growth.

founder.name: Shuhei Nakahara
founder.description: Bilingual (JP/EN) consultant based in Fukuoka. Focused on retail & manufacturing operations, data utilization, and cross-border enablement. Provides hands-on, on-site execution and practical countermeasures.

services.name: Retail Operations Consulting
services.description: Building efficient retail operations and improving sales through data utilization

services.name: Manufacturing Operations Consulting
services.description: Optimizing production processes and improving supply chain management

services.name: Cross-border Business Support
services.description: Strategic planning and execution support for Japan market entry and international expansion

services.name: Data Analytics & AI Utilization
services.description: Business data analysis and operational efficiency improvement using AI technology
